subdisciplines.name: Baroque Architecture
subdisciplines.description: The architectural style of the Baroque era, characterized by elaborate ornamentation and dramatic effects.

subdisciplines.name: Baroque Painting
subdisciplines.description: A style of painting characterized by dramatic lighting, intense emotions and vivid colors.

subdisciplines.name: Baroque Sculpture
subdisciplines.description: A style of sculpture characterized by dramatic poses, dynamic movement, and elaborate ornamentation.
